title: Centralized Approach to Enhancing Persistence in Online Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental proficiency in online learning platforms (LMS) and foundational knowledge of language education design
context.additional_context: Enhancing online learning design competencies in language education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design five or more language education modules using a centralized learning design template
Learners conduct online learning design feedback with peer teachers at least three times using collaboration tools
Learners complete and submit one or more project deliverables based on their developed learning design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
